sense.gloss: (in gagaku or noh) end of a song
sudden, abrupt, rapid, sharp, drastic, radical
immediate, prompt, quick, rapid, urgent, pressing
hurriedly, in a hurry, in haste
limited express (train for which a limited-express ticket is required)
limited express (train making a limited no. of stops)
to hurry, to rush, to hasten, to make something happen sooner
sudden fall, sharp fall, sudden drop, sharp drop
urgently, promptly, at once, right away, without delay, as soon as possible
sudden rise (in price), sharp rise, jump, surge
sudden drop, sharp fall, nosedive, swoop
hasty, rash, rushed, hurried, impatient, impetuous, quick-tempered
high and low speed, fast and slow, pace, tempo
TA-Q-BIN (express home delivery service provided by Yamato Transport)
